text:
I'm Pato Bichara, CEO of
Collective, the university
of the future of Latin America.

Latin America
business ecosystem is

going through a
major transformation

with traditional companies
and multinationals

transforming to digital, global
technology companies coming

to the region, and scaleups
success starting to expand.

And for the first
time in our lives,

that constraint
for growth is not
capital but leadership talent.
And this is why we exist.

For live, cohort-based
education and technology,

we accelerate Latin
America's leadership talent

while building the strongest
professional community
in the region.
Sound familiar?

Think about Harvard for Latin
America's next stage of growth.

We have launched two
successful products,

our Master's in
Business Technology.

Our own version of an MBA
with over 500 graduates.

And our corporate
training programs,

where we have trained more than
6,000 executives and managers

in leadership, business,
and technology skills.
We have a physical campus.

We have an
asset-light model that
helps us be very profitable.

And we have achieved $2
million in ARR with 30% quarter
to quarterly growth.
And this is only the beginning.

Collective is currently
raising $5 million

to accelerate our expansion
throughout the region
and launch new programs.

Come join us build Latin
America's university
of the future.
